Shaw Social Club, Newbury 9th Annual Contest
In this year an additional third section was run. The extra section was seen as this middle section, but the situation seems to have been more of a simple splitting of the lower section than anything else.
Feb. 2, 2013, 11:43 a.m. Feb. 14, 2013, 11:19 a.m.
